name: Stone throwing game
description:
This is my first game, and i made it for practise. I was supposed to do it in one month, but multiplayer was a lot harder to implement then i expected, so it took me a more then 3 months, and i haven`t figured out how to do what i originally intended yet. I know that this game is raw, unfinished and just bad, but i have to improve my skill, so i`m going to upload it anyway

Press 'E' to grab stone/box

Regulate volume by holding '-' or '='

Hold left mouse button to increase the power of the throw and release

Press Backspace to go back to main menu

Throw stones at the bot or other player, hide behind boxes. Floor can be destroyed if there is no box on it.
